UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note for translators: the below DESCRIPTION string will be formatted with other effects automatically.
The symbols must remain the same, but can be placed in whatever order.
the symbol %1$s will be replaced with whatever text represents the effect. For example it might be 'Deal 6 damage'.
the symbol %2$d will be replaced with however many times the effect will be preformed.
The english text here, for example, will end up saying 'Deal 6 damage 4 times.' or similar.
